author: trawick
msg: fix problems in recent change to use mkstemp(); also, fix
not-so-recent bug in flock support (destroy_inter_lock was

author: rbb
msg: FreeBSD 4.0 doesn't like tempnam, so we are using mkstemp now.  I hope
this works on all platforms, but if not we'll just use a #ifdef later.

author: trawick
msg: ap_xlate_conv_buffer(): don't treat it as an error if
we run out of output buffer in a multi-byte translation
(single-byte translation doesn't treat it as an error).

author: jim
msg: Use "standard" m4 quoting to remove the ugly hack in case some
of the arguments have ','s in them, which some do.

author: rbb
msg: Fix readwrite to support BeOS.  BeOS doesn't currently support select'ing
on files, so wait_for_io_or_timeout doesn't work there.
